author: Logan Plant
description: Here's the best price right now for HBO Max subscriptions in 2025.
title: The Best HBO Max Deals for September 2025

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Nioh 3 is shaping up to be exactly the same kind of iterative step above its predecessor that Nioh 2 ended up being. The style switching between Samurai and Ninja is an excellent addition that adds new layers of depth to an already stacked combat system, and the new open fields offer up even more incentive to explore than ever before, with fun challenges, mini bosses, and secret treasures to discover in every corner.
title: Nioh 3 Looks Set to Level Up from Nioh 1 and 2 – IGN First

author: Michael Cripe
description: Square Enix has announced a Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade release date of January 22, 2026, for Nintendo Switch 2 and Xbox Series X | S.
title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake Intergrade Sets Switch 2 and Xbox Release Date With Magic Cards Included in Some Pre-Orders

author: Chris Reed
description: Critter Kitchen’s desperate scrabbling for ingredients and quick-fire pace make it fun to play, but it’s a little too convoluted for neophyte gamers, and it’s a little on the light side to really satisfy strategy hounds. It's great for those in between.
title: Critter Kitchen Board Game Review

description: Everything you need to know to preorder Dragon Quest VII Reimagined, including release date, what comes in each edition, and more.

description: Features overclocking out of the box, "military-grade" components, and a beefier triple fan heatsink.

description: Silver Tempest prices are on the move. Lugia alternate arts and Trainer Gallery hits are climbing, while Regidrago and Alolan Vulpix cool off. Sealed product values are surging, making this week’s trends a key update for collectors and investors.

description: The developers behind Battlefield 6 are encouraging players on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X and S to keep crossplay on, even if they “can’t promise that there will be zero cheaters” on PC.

description: Battlefield 6 developer Ripple Effect hasn’t been the least bit surprised by the steady flow of leaks it has suffered throughout 2025.
title: 'What Will Leak? Everything' — Battlefield 6 Devs Insist They Didn't Want the Game to Suffer From Leaks, but Getting Player Feedback 'Had to Come at Any Cost'

description: It's time for a brand-new Nintendo Direct and this is the place where we'll be gathering all the biggest news from the roughly 60-minute show to ensure you don't miss a thing! And yes, we'll be updating this article throughout the show, so be sure to keep checking back!
title: Nintendo Direct September 2025: Everything Announced So Far (Updating Live)

description: Hollow Knight Silksong’s first major patch is rolling out now to most players, developer Team Cherry has confirmed. Check out the update 1.0.28497 patch notes.

author: Vikki Blake
description: Naughty Dog's Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet will be the studio's biggest and "maybe" most expensive game ever, with creator Neil Druckmann hailing the new project as the "most ambitious game we've ever made."
title: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet is Naughty Dog's Most Expansive And 'Maybe the Most Expensive' Game The Studio Has Ever Made

author: Tom Phillips
description: A photo from the set of Spider-Man: Brand New Day has given fans a look at Jacob Batalon, who will return for the movie after playing sidekick Ned Leeds in Tom Holland's first Marvel trilogy.
title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day Set Photo Shows Tom Holland With Jacob Batalon Wearing a Teasing T-Shirt

author: Tom Phillips
description: The Office actor Rainn Wilson has reflected on a 2006 episode of the classic NBC sitcom, and said its "jaw-droppingly, kind of horrific" humor would have to be "very, very different" if it were made today.
title: The Office Star Slams 'Racist and Insensitive' Christmas Party Episode 'That Kind of Mirrors the United States in a Lot of Ways'

author: Lloyd Coombes
description: You can start playing EA FC 26 in just a few day's time. Here's all you need to know when preordering.
title: EA FC 26 Editions Explained: How To Get Early Access From Next Week

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Back in July, Valve shocked gamers by suddenly removing numerous adult-only games from Steam to appease payment processors. Not long after, itch.io made a similar move in delisting thousands of NSFW games from its search results. Japanese politician Zenko Kurishita recently spoke out about the dangers of this abrupt censorship.
title: Steam Censorship of Adult Games Highlights How Payment Processors 'Wield Immense Power That Even Nations Can't Control,' Says Japanese Politician

author: Vikki Blake
description: Slay the Spire 2 has been delayed to March 2026. And no, it had nothing to do with Silksong.
title: Slay the Spire 2 Release Date Slips to March 2026 — and No, It Had Nothing to Do With Silksong, Dev Insists

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Former Superman actor Henry Cavill was injured while training for the Highlander reboot, delaying the film.
title: Superman Star Henry Cavill Injured While Training for Highlander, Delaying Production Into 2026

description: With just hours to go until today's major Nintendo Direct broadcast, fans have spotted domain name registrations that point to the upcoming Super Mario Bros. Movie sequel — and potentially reveal its title.
title: Mario Movie Sequel Domain Names Spotted Ahead of Nintendo Direct

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Borderlands 4 has launched on Steam to big concurrent player numbers, but the release was marred by complaints about PC performance that have resulted in a ‘mixed’ user review rating on Valve’s platform.
title: Borderlands 4 Dev Gearbox Asks PC Gamers to Keep Playing for at Least 15 Minutes After They Tweak Settings to See How Performance Has Changed, as Negative Steam Reviews Pile Up
